name: feuerball3D – 360° animations
author: Florian Bube

sections.description: This plugin is the easiest and best way to implement your animations. Animations which are created with our studio software can be implemented on each of your sites in some minutes. You dont need any prior knowledge. Its easy to understand and work with.
sections.installation:
If the plugin is installed, there will be a folder on your webspace called fb3d-animations. You can find the folder at YourSiteName/wp-content/uploads/fb3d-animations.
Now you can upload the complete image folder in /fb3d-animations. And you need to copy the xml-file in the fb3d-animations folder.
After this you can go back to your backend. There will be listed all names of animations you have uploaded. Copy the Shortcode and paste it at a site page or comment as you like.
sections.faq:
I have installed the plugin, what now?

Now you got a new tab in your backend, it is called fb3d-animations. There you can check for the next steps.

How do i implement a animation to a page?

First of all you need to upload your image folder and the .xml-file of your project. Then you can use the given shorttag for implementation.
